title: Receive Purchase Order Shipment
description: A warehouse operator needs to receive an incoming shipment against a purchase order (PO), verifying item quantities and noting any discrepancies.

tasks.description: Scan the bill of lading (BOL) to retrieve the associated purchase order details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the PO and its expected items and quantities.

tasks.description: For each item, scan the barcode and enter the received quantity, noting a shortage for one item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the quantities for all items, highlighting the discrepancy.

tasks.description: Finalize the receiving process, which flags the PO as 'Received with Discrepancy' and generates a put-away task.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully closes the receiving event, and the system correctly updates the PO status and creates tasks.
